```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(scales)
library(shiny)

```

```{r, include=FALSE}
#load in joined data set from github
nox_ozone <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wyattjssmith/CMSC205-Project/master/Joined%20NOx%20and%20Ozone%20file.csv?token=AX51vw3i0vr_GVrpbtGF4PBoDul1Wo9Aks5Yxf5nwA%3D%3D")
#make date an actual date
nox_ozone$date_time <- ymd_hms(nox_ozone$date_time)
str(nox_ozone)
nox_ozone<-nox_ozone[-1]
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#X and Y variables select, checkboxes for regression line and smoothing curve, boxcar averages output table with summary stats (min, max range, mean, median)
inputPanel(
  selectInput("X", label = "X Variable:",
              choices = names(nox_ozone)),

  selectInput("Y", label = "Y variable:",
             choices = names(nox_ozone[-1]), selected = names(nox_ozone[9])),
  checkboxInput("table_choice", label = "Print Statistics"),
  radioButtons("line", label = "Show Trend Line", choices = c("Smoothing", "Linear Regression", "None")),
  dateRangeInput("DRI", label = 'Select Date Range', start = '2016-11-07', end = '2016-11-28', min = '2016-11-07', max = '2016-11-28'),
  checkboxInput("filter_data", label = "Filter Data"),
  numericInput("y_min", label = "Y Minimum", value = 0),
  numericInput("y_max", label = "Y Maximum", value = 0)

)

date_nox <- reactive({
  date_filter <- filter(nox_ozone, date_time >= input$DRI[1], date_time <= input$DRI[2])
  if(input$filter_data == TRUE){filter(date_filter, input$Y >= input$y_min, input$Y <= input$y_max)}else{
    date_filter
  }
})


renderPlot({
p<-    ggplot(date_nox(), aes_string(x = input$X, y = input$Y)) +
    geom_point(alpha = .2) +
    labs(title = paste(input$Y, "vs.", input$X), x = input$X, y = input$Y)
      if(input$line == "Smoothing"){ p + geom_smooth()}
       else if(input$line == "Linear Regression"){ p + geom_smooth(method = lm)
      }else{p}
    
})
#Yielding the results
renderText({
  if(input$table_choice == TRUE){paste("Minimum: ", round(min(date_nox()[,input$Y]), digits = 3))}})
renderText({
    if(input$table_choice == TRUE){paste("Maximum: ", round(max(date_nox()[,input$Y]), digits = 3))}})
renderText({
      if(input$table_choice == TRUE){paste("Mean: ", round(mean(date_nox()[,input$Y]), digits = 3))}})
renderText({
        if(input$table_choice == TRUE){paste("Median: ",
                                             round(median(date_nox()[,input$Y]), digits = 3))}})
renderText({
          if(input$table_choice == TRUE){paste("Relative Standard Deviation: ", round(((sd(date_nox()[,input$Y]))/(mean(date_nox()[,input$Y])))*100, digits = 3))}
  })


    


  

```
